name: NegotiationResult
description: Represents the result of a negotiation of network components.

fields.name: components
fields.description: The field for the components record component.

fields.name: success
fields.description: The field for the success record component.

fields.name: failureReasons
fields.description: The field for the failureReasons record component.

constructors.name: NegotiationResult
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a NegotiationResult record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. Reference components are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) ; primitive components are compared with '=='.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the value of the components record component.

methods.name: success
methods.description: Returns the value of the success record component.

methods.name: failureReasons
methods.description: Returns the value of the failureReasons record component.
